tasks.label: Copy for AtCoder Submission
tasks.command: cat "${file}" | awk '($0 ~ /^ *System\.out\.print/) && ($0 !~ /\/\/ SUBMIT/) { print "//" $0; next } { print }' | grep -v '^package' | iconv -f utf-8 -t sjis | clip.exe

tasks.label: mvnCleanAll
tasks.command: find . -name "pom.xml" -type f -exec dirname {} \; | xargs -I {} sh -c 'echo "Cleaning {}..." && mvn -f {}/pom.xml clean'

tasks.label: mvnClean
tasks.command: find . -name "pom.xml" -type f -exec dirname {} \; | xargs -I {} sh -c 'if [ -d "{}/target" ]; then echo "Cleaning {}..." && mvn -f "{}/pom.xml" clean; else echo "Skipping {}: No target directory."; fi'
